title: 你们是怎么念他们名字的呢?
author: SYS_TEM
txt_content:
念做Mr.Tang win8
即米斯特唐文八
@simon3000 
年做西蒙叁仟

replies.author: simon3000
SYS_TEM
replies.txt_content:

念的很正确√
